1.演者の初期配置
2.演出開始
namedChar26
namedChar26

Old Mage: If you've moved here, at least greet us... Is it
just you?

Girl Relm: Daddy and the others are not here because they
are working on building the road.

Old Mage: You don't have to be so scared. By the way, isn't
that a splendid brick arch?
Old Mage: Your father seems to be quite skilled.

Girl Relm: I made it with the fragments of bricks that were
lying around.

Old Mage: That's amazing! Understanding complex structures
is essential for a mage!

Old Mage: It seems like you like books. How about reading a
book of magic to pass the time?

Girl Relm: Is it really okay? I love books! If you have a
lot of books, I want to see them and learn magic too!

Old Mage: Of course, that's not a problem, but you look like
a girl...
Old Mage: Why do you call me 'Boku'?
Girl Relm: ......Daddy said he wanted a boy.
00_Black

Moving to the outskirts of Kanonas due to her father's work
was a fortunate event for Relm. Not only did she have access
to new books, but she also had the chance to encounter magic
and, above all, have someone to talk to.

The old man had a past of aiming for a magic academy and
facing failure. There were many people like him living in
the outskirts of Kanonas. That's how high the wall of the
magic academy is.

The old man, who had been involved in magic for many years,
highly appreciated the talent of constructing three-
dimensional arches with fragments of bricks and the
eagerness for books. He had a strong intuition that this
child definitely had the potential to become a mage.

Above all, he couldn't leave the girl who called herself
Boku alone, in order to capture her father's attention.

Relm greedily learned various knowledge under the old man.
About magic, the empire, mythology, plants... It was as if
she was trying to make up for lost time from the day she
became aware of the world until today.

The old man began to recognize Relm's innate talent as a
mage. This child might fulfill the dreams he couldn't
achieve himself. He started to entrust Relm with the dream
of belonging to a magic academy.
イベント終了用
